triage.root_cause: Todo dataclass lacks custom __eq__ and __hash__, causing field-by-field comparison and unhashable behavior
risk_points: Backward compatibility: code relying on field-by-field comparison
Hash stability: id field must be immutable and unique
verification_targets: Todo(id=1, text='a') == Todo(id=1, text='b') returns True

implementation.approach: Added __eq__ method comparing by id only, and __hash__ method hashing by id
